  • コンストラクタの詳細

    • MCEFDragContext

      public MCEFDragContext()

  • メソッドの詳細

    • getVirtualModifiers

      public int getVirtualModifiers(int btnMask)
      Used to prevent re-selecting stuff while dragging If the user is dragging, emulate having no buttons pressed
      パラメータ:
      btnMask - the actual mask
      戻り値:
      a mask modified based on if the user is dragging

    • getVirtualCursor

      public int getVirtualCursor(int cursorType)
      When the user is dragging, the browser-set cursor shouldn't be used Instead the cursor should change based on what action would be performed when they release at the given location However, the browser-set cursor also needs to be tracked, so this handles that as well
      パラメータ:
      cursorType - the actual cursor type (should be the result of getActualCursor() if you're just trying to see the current cursor)
      戻り値:
      the drag operation modified cursor if dragging, or the actual cursor if not

    • isDragging

      public boolean isDragging()
      Checks if a drag operation is currently happening
      戻り値:
      true if the user is dragging, elsewise false

    • getDragData

      public org.cef.callback.CefDragData getDragData()
      Gets the CefDragData of the current drag operation
      戻り値:
      the current drag operation's data

    • getMask

      public int getMask()
      Gets the allowed operation mask for this drag event
      戻り値:
      -1 for any, 0 for none, 1 for copy (TODO: others)

    • getActualCursor

      public int getActualCursor()
      Gets the browser-set cursor
      戻り値:
      the cursor that has been set by the browser, disregarding drag operations

    • startDragging

      public void startDragging(org.cef.callback.CefDragData dragData, int mask)

    • stopDragging

      public void stopDragging()

    • updateCursor

      public boolean updateCursor(int operation)
